title: Reverse factoring (supply chain finance) documentation
dataVerified: Supplier, buyer, intermediary bank, invoice amount, payment terms
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents supply chain finance fraud. Domain binding verifies financial institution. Tamper-evident payment guarantee. Trade finance integrity. Prevents duplicate financing.
